title: Michael Caine, 86, shows off his flair for style in a black leather jacket
text:
They have been happily married for 46 years.

And Michael Caine appeared as united as ever with his wife Shakira as they enjoyed a romantic dinner date the Ivy Chelsea Garden on Wednesday evening.

The Italian Job actor, 86, rocked a trendy black leather jacket with a baby blue shirt accompanied by black trousers and smart shoes.

Dinner date: Michael Caine appeared as united as ever with his wife Shakira as they enjoyed a romantic dinner date the Ivy Chelsea Garden on Wednesday evening

The big screen icon is still using a walking stick after he had a nasty fall on a patch of ice last year, and his elegant wife, 72, gave him a helping hand.

His actress wife looked typically chic in a white blouse teamed with a pair of black cigarette trousers and an elegant black jacket with a navy silk scarf.

She added slick black heels and accessorised further with a diamond-studded clutch bag.

'Michael slipped and broke his ankle in his garden during the recent heavy snow,' his spokesperson told The Mirror at the time, concerning his ankle injury. 'He is in fine health and great spirits.'

Stylish: The Italian Job actor, 86, rocked a trendy black leather jacket with a baby blue shirt accompanied by black trousers and smart shoes

In July, he told TimeOut: ‘It’s coming along fine. It’s just tremendous inconvenience.'

Meanwhile, earlier this year the legendary British actor revealed how he met the love of his life after seeing her star in a coffee commercial.

'I was at home and this commercial came on, for Maxwell House coffee. And there was this beautiful Brazilian girl,' he told Andrew Denton's Interview.

'I said to my mate "we're going to Brazil tomorrow - I have plenty of money, we're going to find her.'''

Much to the actor's surprise, though, was the fact his dream woman was not on the other side of the world but instead a stone's throw away from where he was living.

'I got all excited and said let's go down to the tavern to have a drink and this other guy comes in. He said "we made that commercial - she's not in Brazil, she's on the Fulham Road" which is about a mile away from me.'

Sir Michael told Andrew he called his future bride 11 times before she agreed to go out with him.

Happy days: Sir Michael once said he called his future bride 11 times before she agreed to go out with him (pictured in 1968)

'If she had said no (on their date) I'd decided - forget it,' he said, adding that the happiest years of his life have been, 'the last 46' while married to Shakira.

Michael married Shakira in 1973 and they have one daughter together, Natasha, 42.

The Dirty Rotten Scoundrels star also has another daughter, Dominique, who he had with his previous wife, actress Patricia Haines.

Michael has also told in recent years how he and Shakira cracked the code for an enduring marriage in Hollywood.

'In this business, you're surrounded by beautiful women - but I've got one at home,' he said.

'I've got one of the most beautiful ones I've ever seen, so I've never been tempted to stray.'
